articles.content: New England Patriots receiver N’Keal Harry’s journey toward being an elite receiver will only get harder. The Patriots force-fed Harry at the beginning of this season, and he’s had little to show for… [+3292 chars]

articles.title: Soccer Star Raul Jimenez Undergoes Surgery for Fractured Skull After Violent Collision - TMZ
articles.description: Mexican soccer star Raul Jimenez underwent surgery Sunday night after fracturing his skull during a Premier League game in London, his team confirmed.
articles.content:
Mexican soccer star Raul Jimenez underwent surgery Sunday night after fracturing his skull during a Premier League game in London, his team confirmed.
